name: The Wrong Dimension
description:
Hey! This is my Second ever Game (Jam) that I have completed. It is a top-down Adventure Game where there is a timer. Everytime the timer reaches 0, you are teleported back to the start, The Map changes entirely as you do. You have 50 seconds to explore a ZONE and find the source Egg. If you find the egg then break it and that area won't spawn again. Find all 4 eggs and break them, and you have escaped the Wrong Dimension.  Enjoy.

This game is heavily inspired by BlackThornProd's "The Game Creation Recipe", their Youtube - BlackThornProd

This is my Entry for "Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1", My first time in a Brackeys jam.

I am an Indie Game Dev. All the game art assets are done by me, I reused some code from my past projects, The Sound assets are taken from the Internet.

Check out My Youtube where I will soon post a Devlog for this Game.

Thanks for checking this out! :)
